nodes.text: An unidentified Paataatus held the rank of Prince Militaire of the Hiveborn during the Nikardun campaigns. The Prince Militaire commanded the forces of the Paataatus military. He invented the naval tactic of the "light show", feigning a vicious attack while actually minimizing damage.

The Prince Militaire covertly appealed to Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet Senior Captain Thrawn to liberate the Paataatus from subjugation under the Nikardun Destiny. Thrawn understood the nature of the Prince Militaire's please and together, the Chiss and Paataatus forces successfully liberated the Paataatus homeworld of Nettehi from the Nikardun.
After the battle, the Prince Militaire allowed Thrawn to use the Paataatus' long-range communications triad to send a message back to Csilla.
